Parameters: long: The timestamp of the most recent message in the conversation.
setLatestTimestamp(long).Description: Sets the timestamp of the most recent message in an unread conversation. If a messaging notification has been posted by your application and has not yet been cancelled, posting a later notification with the same id and tag but without a newer timestamp may result in Android Auto not displaying a heads up notification for the later notification.

Parameters: String: The text of the new unread message.
addMessage(java.lang.String).Description: Appends a new unread message to the list of messages for this conversation. The messages should be added from oldest to newest.

build().Description: Builds a new unread conversation object.

Parameters: PendingIntent: The pending intent to use.
setReadPendingIntent(android.app.Pending.Description: Sets the pending intent that will be sent once the messages in this notification are read.
